Sentencas: CO 2 conversion into fuels and high value-added chemical feedstocks, such as methane, has gained novel interest as a crucial process for further manufacturing multi -carbon products.
Titulo: Bimetallic Ni-Fe Supported by Gadolinium Doped Ceria (GDC) Catalyst for CO 2 Methanation

Sentencas: Methane, CH 4 , becomes a promising alternative for environmental and energy supply issues.
Titulo: Bimetallic Ni-Fe Supported by Gadolinium Doped Ceria (GDC) Catalyst for CO 2 Methanation

Sentencas: Nickel -based catalysts were found to be very active and selective for CH 4 production.
Titulo: Bimetallic Ni-Fe Supported by Gadolinium Doped Ceria (GDC) Catalyst for CO 2 Methanation

Sentencas: The use of promoter and support material to develop high activity, high selectivity, and durable catalysts for CO 2 methanation at low temperature is a challenge.
Titulo: Bimetallic Ni-Fe Supported by Gadolinium Doped Ceria (GDC) Catalyst for CO 2 Methanation

Sentencas: Gadolinium -Doped Ceria (GDC) has been known as material for Solid Oxide Fuel Cell (SOFC) and Solid Oxide Electrolysis Cell (SOEC) due to higher ionic conductivity and lower operating temperatures.
Titulo: Bimetallic Ni-Fe Supported by Gadolinium Doped Ceria (GDC) Catalyst for CO 2 Methanation

Sentencas: However, few researches have been done regarding to CO 2 methanation over GDC as catalyst support so far.
Titulo: Bimetallic Ni-Fe Supported by Gadolinium Doped Ceria (GDC) Catalyst for CO 2 Methanation

Sentencas: In this present work, CO 2 methanation was investigated over bimetallic Ni-Fe catalyst supported by GDC.
Titulo: Bimetallic Ni-Fe Supported by Gadolinium Doped Ceria (GDC) Catalyst for CO 2 Methanation

Sentencas: The results showed that CH 4 production rate by using Ni-Fe/GDC catalyst was higher than that of GDC at all reaction temperatures carried on.
Titulo: Bimetallic Ni-Fe Supported by Gadolinium Doped Ceria (GDC) Catalyst for CO 2 Methanation

Sentencas: Ni-Fe/GDC showed remarkable CH 4 production rate as of 17.73 mmol.g cat -1 .h
Titulo: Bimetallic Ni-Fe Supported by Gadolinium Doped Ceria (GDC) Catalyst for CO 2 Methanation
Bimetallic Ni-Fe Supported by Gadolinium Doped Ceria (GDC) Catalyst for CO 2 Methanation
Bimetallic Ni-Fe Supported by Gadolinium Doped Ceria (GDC) Catalyst for CO 2 Methanation

Sentencas: No catalytic activity was produced by GDC catalyst only.
Titulo: Bimetallic Ni-Fe Supported by Gadolinium Doped Ceria (GDC) Catalyst for CO 2 Methanation

Sentencas: The highest CO 2 conversion (46.50%) was observed at 280 degrees C, with almost 100% selectivity to CH 4 .
Titulo: Bimetallic Ni-Fe Supported by Gadolinium Doped Ceria (GDC) Catalyst for CO 2 Methanation

Sentencas: The turnover frequency (TOF) value of Ni-Fe/GDC (4529.32 h -1 ) was the highest than that of Ni and common CO 2 methanation catalyst, Ni/Al 2 O 3 catalysts at 280 degrees C, further displaying the outstanding low -temperature catalytic activity.
Titulo: Bimetallic Ni-Fe Supported by Gadolinium Doped Ceria (GDC) Catalyst for CO 2 Methanation
